official-title.#text:
To require the payment of the full amount of separation pay otherwise due to former members of the
			 Armed Forces who were separated under the former Don’t Ask, Don’t Tell
			 Policy of the Department of Defense and were only paid a portion of the
			 full amount.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Military Separation Pay Fairness Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Military Separation Pay Fairness Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:
Full separation pay for former members of the Armed Forces who were separated under former Don't
			 Ask, Don't Tell Policy

text.#text: Not later than 60 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the

identify each former member of the Armed Forces who was separated from the Armed Forces for
